eu.amidst.dynamic.inference

Class DynamicMAPInference

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.dynamic.inference.DynamicMAPInference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceAlgorithmForDBN

    public class DynamicMAPInference
extends Object
implements InferenceAlgorithmForDBN
    This class implements the MAP Inference algorithm for DynamicBayesianNetwork models.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DynamicMAPInference.SearchAlgorithm
      Represents the search algorithm to be used.

        public void setNumberOfMergedClassVars(int nMergedClassVars)
